title: This next-gen technology will change games forever...
author: Connor "Bluedrake42" Hill

key_facts: FACT: An AI postprocess filter can simulate fluid dynamics in real time without traditional physics engines or particle systems.
FACT: The AI can pour water from one glass to another in a physically plausible manner, despite no actual liquid being present.
FACT: AI-generated flames on a hand appear realistic and respond dynamically to hand movements, suggesting physical understanding.
FACT: AI Minecraft operates without a game engine, relying solely on real-time AI video generation.
FACT: Gajan splatting captures photorealistic 3D environments using only an iPhone camera and video input.
FACT: Gajan splat maps are based on point clouds and degrade when zoomed in, unlike optimized static meshes.
FACT: Converting Gajan splat maps into game-ready assets traditionally requires manual, repetitive work by artists.
FACT: AI is increasingly capable of automating the conversion of raw scans into optimized 3D models for games.
FACT: AI can apply targeted visual effects to specific parts of a scene or character without affecting the entire environment.
FACT: The speaker uses Unreal Engine to prototype AI-driven physics simulations through postprocessing filters.
FACT: AI-generated effects like volumetric liquid filling and pouring demonstrate behavior consistent with real-world physics.
FACT: The speaker is pursuing graduate studies in machine learning due to fascination with AI's emerging capabilities.
key_opinions: OPINION: AI models are inadvertently developing the ability to simulate real-world physics during video generation.
OPINION: The realism of AI-generated effects cannot be explained by mere image copying—it implies genuine physical understanding.
OPINION: AI is not just replicating existing content but creating novel, contextually appropriate visual behaviors.
OPINION: The democratization of high-quality asset creation will empower indie studios to compete with AAA developers.
OPINION: The primary goal of any industry should be producing the best product with minimal resource use.
OPINION: The widespread adoption of AI-assisted tools will lead to an explosion of photorealistic game content.
OPINION: Whether this technological shift is positive or negative depends on individual perspective.
OPINION: AI’s role in creative workflows is evolving beyond automation to include moderate creativity and technical judgment.
key_datapoints: DATA: AI can generate realistic fluid simulations (e.g., pouring water) in real time without traditional game engine physics.
DATA: Gajan splatting enables photorealistic 3D capture using consumer-grade iPhone cameras.
DATA: Most modern iPhone cameras now outperform specialized photogrammetry cameras from a decade ago.
DATA: Converting Gajan splat maps into game-ready assets typically requires significant manual labor.
DATA: AI is becoming proficient at handling repetitive, technically complex tasks like mesh optimization.
DATA: AI-generated flame effects on a hand exhibit dynamic behavior consistent with real fire physics.
DATA: AI Minecraft runs entirely as a real-time AI video simulation with no underlying game engine.
DATA: AI can apply targeted visual effects to isolated parts of a 3D environment or character.
DATA: The speaker has been experimenting with AI postprocessing for several months across multiple applications.
